pageProduct.name: Swisse Kids Rest & Restore 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Kids Rest + Restore is a premium quality formula to provide calming support, assist relaxation and help encourage natural, restful sleep.

?Chamomile* to calm and relax the mind, relieve tension and soothe the nerves
?Chamomile* to reduce restless sleep and support healthy sleeping patterns to encourage a natural, restful sleep
?Magnesium to help maintain muscle relaxation and support a healthy nervous system when dietary intake is inadequate
?Great tasting
?Natural banana flavour
?99.9% sugar free
?Convenient chewable tablet
?No added artificial colours or flavours
*traditionally used in Western herbal medicine

Size: 60 Pack

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.

Ingredients

EACH CHEWABLE TABLET CONTAINS:
CHAMOMILE (Matricaria chamomilla extract 20 mg) equiv. dry herb 400 mg
MAGNESIUM (from magnesium phosphate pentahydrate) 60 mg

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - CHILD DOSAGE:
2-8 years: Chew one tablet daily.
9-12 years: Chew two tablets daily.
For healthy sleep support: Take in the evening as per directions for use.
Or as directed by a healthcare professional. Do not swallow whole.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
